SELECT_FILE_FORMAT_ICS.message: Export Birthdays as an ICS File.
SELECT_FILE_FORMAT_ICS.description: Label for the ICS file type radio button

SELECT_ICS_DESCRIPTION.message:
This is most likely the format you are looking for. ICS is a universal calendar format supported by Microsoft Outlook, Google Calendar, and Apple Calendar.

Be sure to create a new calendar in your preferred calendar app before importing!

Only Google Calendar properly supports later event removal.
SELECT_ICS_DESCRIPTION.description: Description for the ICS file type radio button
